mapper.sql: ID, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, ROW_VERSION, ROW_STATUS, EXT_ATT, COMPENSATE_ID, APP_NAME, CLASS_FULL_NAME, METHOD_NAME, PARAMS, CODEC_PROTOCOL, STATUS, CURRENT_NUM, MAX_NUM, RESULT
mapper.insert: insert into compensate_case ( GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, ROW_VERSION, ROW_STATUS, EXT_ATT, COMPENSATE_ID, APP_NAME, CLASS_FULL_NAME, METHOD_NAME, PARAMS, CODEC_PROTOCOL, STATUS, CURRENT_NUM, MAX_NUM, RESULT ) values ( now(), #{gmtModified}, 0, 0, #{extAtt}, #{compensateId}, #{appName}, #{classFullName}, #{methodName}, #{params}, #{codecProtocol}, #{status}, #{currentNum}, #{maxNum}, #{result} )
mapper.update: update compensate_case GMT_MODIFIED = now(), ROW_VERSION = ROW_VERSION + 1, EXT_ATT = #{extAtt}, COMPENSATE_ID = #{compensateId}, APP_NAME = #{appName}, CLASS_FULL_NAME = #{classFullName}, METHOD_NAME = #{methodName}, PARAMS = #{params}, CODEC_PROTOCOL = #{codecProtocol}, STATUS = #{status}, CURRENT_NUM = #{currentNum}, MAX_NUM = #{maxNum}, RESULT = #{result}, where ID = #{id} and ROW_STATUS = 0 and ROW_VERSION = #{rowVersion}
update compensate_case set ROW_STATUS = -1 where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select from compensate_case where ROW_STATUS = 0 and GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate} and GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified} and ROW_VERSION = #{rowVersion} and ROW_STATUS = #{rowStatus} and EXT_ATT = #{extAtt} and COMPENSATE_ID = #{compensateId} and APP_NAME = #{appName} and CLASS_FULL_NAME = #{classFullName} and METHOD_NAME = #{methodName} and PARAMS = #{params} and CODEC_PROTOCOL = #{codecProtocol} and STATUS = #{status} and CURRENT_NUM = #{currentNum} and MAX_NUM = #{maxNum} and RESULT = #{result} order by #{sort} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from compensate_case where ROW_STATUS = 0 and GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate} and GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified} and ROW_VERSION = #{rowVersion} and ROW_STATUS = #{rowStatus} and EXT_ATT = #{extAtt} and COMPENSATE_ID = #{compensateId} and APP_NAME = #{appName} and CLASS_FULL_NAME = #{classFullName} and METHOD_NAME = #{methodName} and PARAMS = #{params} and CODEC_PROTOCOL = #{codecProtocol} and STATUS = #{status} and CURRENT_NUM = #{currentNum} and MAX_NUM = #{maxNum} and RESULT = #{result}
select from compensate_case where ROW_STATUS = 0 and id = #{id}
